name: Love, Kitten & a cleaner Bot
description:
Love, Kitten & a cleaner Bot

Play as an intruding Kitten and find a cute loving friend!

Your goal is to drop everything to the ground to "feed" the cleaner bot that has fallen in love with you until it is full. So do parcour and paw them to destroy them!

And if you don't know how to reach certain heights, try jump on your little companion. But don't be too slow or otherwise your friend will run out of batterie!


This game was made for the Wowie Jam 4.0 in 3 days as a solo project.

The Soundtracks "Happy", "On the Ball", "Shadow Tag" and "Turkey Two Step" were made beforehand.
